George Glass, Chief Systems Architect, BT, explains how his team is using the Digital Maturity Model to assess the maturity of many of the company’s departments.</div></div></div><div 					errorMessage = "<span style='font-size:16px;color:#BC0C06;'>" + errorMessage + "</span>";
